participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, enjoys outdoor activities, especially skateboarding.
participant_1.background: I'm a skateboarder. I am always wearing a hat. I've a broken arm. My friends are all skateboarders.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Caring and sociable, loves music and spending time with family and pets.
participant_2.background: I have one older sister. I'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. My favourite artist is Travis Scott. I like playing basketball. My mother is a dentist.
